last_episode_to_air.name: The Darkest Hour (2)
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the sun rises on his 18th birthday, will Vlad be granted his biggest wish and become human? With the Blood Seed flourishing and his family under attack, it's certainly not going to be an easy decision to make.

name: Young Dracula
overview: The misadventures of Vlad and Ingrid, who have moved to Britain from Transylvania with their father Count Dracula.

episodes.name: When You're a Stranger
episodes.overview: Chased out of Transylvania by a mob of angry peasants, the Dracula family are forced to move to England. Vlad hopes it's a chance to be a normal kid but his new neighbour, vampire-obsessed Robin, is a long way from normal.

episodes.name: Dead-Ucation
episodes.overview: Vlad goes to school where the new woodwork teacher, Van Helsing, becomes convinced that Robin is a vampire. Believing that the Branaghs have reported him to the school authorities, the Count declares a feud.

episodes.name: Mummy Returns
episodes.overview: Ingrid invites her mother to visit. Worried that Magda will hurt them again, Vlad persuades the Count to kick her out. She moves in with the Branaghs and devises a plan to marry the Count in order to claim the castle as her own.

episodes.name: Slaytime TV
episodes.overview: Robin suspects that he and Vlad were switched as babies while the Branaghs were on holiday in Transylvania. Seeing an opportunity to get rid of Vlad, Ingrid sets about convincing the Count that it's true.

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: Vlad accidentally hypnotizes his father and decides to take advantage by turning him into a normal dad. He also hypnotizes Robin's parents into believing that they are vampires.

episodes.name: Toothache
episodes.overview: Vlad has toothache and is worried that it means his fangs are coming through. The Count tries to get rid of Ingrid by arranging a marriage for her, so she enlists Robin to pose as her boyfriend.

episodes.name: A Matter of Life and Chess
episodes.overview: Vlad tries to stop his father from attending the school's Parent's Evening. Chandu, who was mummified 300 years ago, escapes from his imprisonment in the Count's basement and sets out to get his revenge.

episodes.name: Blood Relations
episodes.overview: Vlad's 13th birthday is interrupted by a surprise visit from his grandparents. Feeling that the Count is not upholding traditional vampire values, they decide the only solution is for Vlad to gain his full vampire powers early.

episodes.name: The Sleepover
episodes.overview: When cockroaches infest the Branagh house, the family is forced to move into the castle. But the Count is struggling with his peasant-free diet and the kids must stop him from biting Elizabeth.

episodes.name: Blood Sport
episodes.overview: Vlad wants to join the school rugby team, while Robin is determined to avoid it. Ingrid starts auditioning the boys at school, looking for a husband. Van Helsing sneaks into the castle, determined to get a photograph of vampires.

episodes.name: Father's Day
episodes.overview: It's Father's Day and Vlad and Robin invite both their dads camping, in the hope that they'll be a good influence on each other but instead they end up competing. Meanwhile, Van Helsing tries to impress his new girlfriend.

episodes.name: Halloscream
episodes.overview: Vlad and Robin accidentally unleash an ancient curse that will make the family normal. But if three screams are heard before midnight, the curse will be lifted and they will return to being vampires.

episodes.name: The Blood Test
episodes.overview: Vlad faces the first of his blood tests, an important exam that he must pass in order to gain his full vampire powers. Upset that he can't help Vlad with the test, Robin decides to try being normal and joins the school football team.

episodes.name: Countdown
episodes.overview: The Count decides that Vlad needs an evil stepmother and hosts a Hunt Ball to find a bride. Ingrid invites the Branaghs, who are unaware that they are on the menu and at midnight the vampires will be after their blood.

episodes.name: Kidnipped
episodes.overview: Vlad wants peace between vampires and slayers, but no-one else agrees with him. The Count kidnaps Jonno to lure the slayer in, but Van Helsing has had the same idea and kidnapped Vlad and Ingrid.

episodes.name: The Yanks Are Coming
episodes.overview: The Count is looking forward to a visit from his brother and his family, but is shocked to discover that Ivan the Bloodthirsty is now living blood-free and calling himself Harvey.

episodes.name: Mirror Mirror
episodes.overview: Boris and Vlad discover that there may be a cure for vampirism. Jonno and Van Helsing plant clues about the Blood Mirror, which will return the whole family to their mortal state if it is smashed.

episodes.name: Bad Reflection
episodes.overview: Shy, clumsy Boris faces his destiny and becomes a powerful vampire. Despite Vlad's hopes that he won't become evil, the new, stronger Boris uses the Blood Mirror to drain his father and the Count of their powers.

episodes.name: Dad's Back
episodes.overview: When he learns that Renfield's father invented a potion to cure vampirism, Vlad puts his alchemy lessons to use and resurrects the old man. But Renfield Senior is more interested in getting his revenge on the Count.

episodes.name: Baby Dracula
episodes.overview: Vlad's mother is back and she's pregnant. The Count decides that the new baby should replace Vlad as his son and heir, but Vlad suspects that the father may actually be Magda's werewolf boyfriend, Patrick.

episodes.name: Insomnia
episodes.overview: Vlad suffers from a recurring nightmare in which the Branagh family are trying to slay him. In the dream world, he meets the Grand High Vampire who tells him that he is the Chosen One and must embrace his destiny.

episodes.name: Love Bites
episodes.overview: It's Valentine's Day and the Count brews up a love potion, Ingrid is horrified to discover she's falling in love with a breather, while Vlad and Robin compete for the affections of the new girl at school.

episodes.name: Bodyswap
episodes.overview: Vlad and Robin visit the museum to find the Staff of Carpathia which they believe can cure vampirism. The Count leaves his body to sneak past a security guard, but accidentally ends up in Van Helsing's body.

episodes.name: Sweet Sixteen
episodes.overview: On her sixteenth birthday, Ingrid is looking forward to facing the Blood Mirror for her transformation, but has second thoughts when she finds that her reflection is even more evil than she is and wants to kill Will.

episodes.name: Eclipse
episodes.overview: When the police arrive at the castle asking about a missing man, Vlad fears the worst and sets about trying to make his father look innocent. Ingrid takes advantage of a total eclipse to sneak out to the cinema with Will.

episodes.name: When Vampires Go Bad
episodes.overview: The Grand High Vampire accuses the Count of breaking Vampire Law. If found guilty, he will be sentenced to death. Things get even worse when the Grand High Vampire is murdered and it looks as if the Count may be responsible.

episodes.name: The Chosen One
episodes.overview: Vampires gather at the castle to select a new Grand High Vampire, but when the first candidates crumble to dust, thoughts turn to an ancient prophecy stating that when the bloodlines weaken, only the Chosen One can wear the crown.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: Suffering from blood poisoning, Ingrid finds herself on the run from slayers. With his powers as the Chosen One increasing, Vlad has visions of his sister's plight and decides to help her and bring her to their new home.

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.overview: Vlad invites Erin to stay at the school, unaware that she is an undercover slayer out to avenge her brother. When Bertrand arrives, Vlad must prove he is the Chosen One by opening an ancient book that will give him power over all vampires.

episodes.name: Faustian Slip
episodes.overview: Vlad sees a chance to get out of his father's over-strict training regime and appoints his mother as Regent. But he's been tricked and must find a way to get out of it before Magda's desire for publicity leads the slayers to them.

episodes.name: Fangs for the Memories
episodes.overview: Still believing that Erin is a half-fang struggling to come to terms with being a vampire, Vlad tries to comfort her by sharing memories of his childhood and explains his hope that vampires and breathers can live together in peace.

episodes.name: Carpathian Feast
episodes.overview: When Vlad accidentally humiliates his father by demonstrating his powers, he agrees to make amends by throwing a feast, but must find a way to stop it when he learns that the Count plans to kill Erin at the end of the party.

episodes.name: Blood Thief
episodes.overview: Believing she is distracting Vlad, Bertrand devises a plan to get rid of Erin and make it look like an accident. Meanwhile, Renfield plays detective to find out who has been stealing the Count's blood.

episodes.name: Bad to the Bone
episodes.overview: Powerful vampire Ramanga arrives, expecting the Praedictum Impaver to be opened and demanding to see the Chosen One. But Vlad has been summoned by the Blood Mirror and must face not just one but a thousand evil reflections.

episodes.name: Bad Vlad
episodes.overview: With his evil reflection taking over, Vlad is out of control. More powerful than ever, Vlad turns against his family and Erin and they are unable to stop him.

episodes.name: Therapy
episodes.overview: Emotionally ruined after Vlad tried to kill her, Ingrid talks to a psychologist and examines memories of her life. Erin hopes that the Praedictum Impaver may have a cure for her brother.

episodes.name: The Return
episodes.overview: Vlad's back and wants to learn more about the clan leaders so he can control them when he takes power. But Jonno and Mina Van Helsing unexpectedly turn up at the school and Vlad must test if their mind-wipes are still in place.

episodes.name: Hit Chicks
episodes.overview: Ingrid turns a visiting netball team into vampires and sends them out to kill Vlad, but the inexperienced girls fail miserably. While searching Erin's room, Bertrand discovers that she is not only a breather, but also a slayer.

episodes.name: Blood Loyalties
episodes.overview: Unsure whether or not to trust Erin's warning about the coming slayer attack, Vlad and the Count visit the Slayers' Guild where they find and destroy a powerful weapon, but Jonno is not convinced by Vlad's desire for peace.

episodes.name: All for One
episodes.overview: With the slayers closing in, Ingrid out to kill him, and Bertrand turned traitor, Vlad needs the power of the Praedictum Impaver to survive, but to everyone's surprise the book brings Sethius back to life.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Undead
episodes.overview: Vlad is determined to make the ceasefire between vampires and slayers work, but faces opposition from all sides: the Vampire High Council, the Slayers' Guild, and even the Count and Ingrid would rather go back to their old ways.

episodes.name: Revamped
episodes.overview: Vlad and Bertand round up the street fangs and set up the Revamp training program to teach coexistence. Hoping to gain a place on the Vampire High Council, Ingrid helps the Count and Ramanga in their plots to end the ceasefire.

episodes.name: Storm in a Blood Cup
episodes.overview: Vlad must find a way to get out of his engagement before the Blood Tea Ceremony, but his attempts to make her look bad have no effect on his father and Ramanga. With blood supplies running low, it becomes harder to maintain peace.

episodes.name: The Crown of Ludlaw Erant
episodes.overview: Miss Mccauley wants one of the Revamp kids to join the school senate, so Vlad arranges a quiz to choose the candidate, but Malik and the mysterious shape-shifter have plans of their own.

episodes.name: Murderer in the Midst
episodes.overview: Bertrand investigates Ryan's murder, but quickly discovers that almost everyone had both motive and opportunity. With help from the Slayers' heat sensors in the school, he begins to suspect a shape-shifter is involved.

episodes.name: Bloodbound
episodes.overview: Ramanga and Adze plan to use an ancient, forbidden weapon to kill Vlad after the Blood Binding ceremony. Although Bertrand suspects the truth, Vlad will not trust him without evidence.

episodes.name: Do The Bite Thing
episodes.overview: Erin is hovering between life and death and can only be saved by becoming a vampire, so Vlad must decide whether to bite her and risk her hating him forever. Malik claims that he is the Count's eldest son, but will the Count accept him?

episodes.name: Loyalty's for Breathers
episodes.overview: As Vlad struggles to overcome his blood thirst, the Count is disappointed in him and declares a duel to the death between Vlad and Malik to decide who will be heir.

episodes.name: Sun and Heir
episodes.overview: Trapped in the attic with the sun coming in, the Count tells Malik and Ingrid how his brother died and confesses that he abandoned Malik's mother. Bertrand finally finds proof about the shape-shifter, but cannot persuade Vlad to listen.

episodes.name: Whatever It Takes
episodes.overview: Mina is preparing the slayers for war, and Jonno can only persuade her to call it off if Vlad will slay Erin. Determined to make peace work at any price, and fearing the life that Erin will lead as a vampire, Vlad agrees to Jonno's plan.

episodes.name: Bootiful Breathers
episodes.overview: George Lansley, new member of the Vampire High Council, claims to support the peace treaty, but Ingrid discovers that he has bought his way onto the Council using blood harvested from a breather farm.

episodes.name: Cuckoo in the Nest
episodes.overview: Vlad finally discovers that Bertrand had been right about Elizabeta. Renfield brews a potion to stop the shape-shifter, but they soon find that it's not so easy to track her down.

episodes.name: Kiss of Death
episodes.overview: As the poison takes hold, the Count starts hallucinating, and it's a race against time for Renfield as he tries to brew an antidote. Meanwhile, Elizabeta, Malik and Erin try to destroy Vlad and Ingrid.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: The Count resorts to bribery when he learns Vlad is only planning a brief stopover back home during his world travels. When Vlad starts to feel ill, Renfield's search for a cure uncovers a surprising family secret.

episodes.name: Who's The Daddy
episodes.overview: Vlad is angry to discover the secret his father has been hiding from him for 18 years. Meanwhile, Ingrid is trying to climb the ladder at the VHC by dusting her competition.

episodes.name: Flesh and Blood
episodes.overview: When the Count converts Garside into a vampire-themed hotel, Vlad invites his breather mother to stay without revealing his true identity. Will Ingrid's early return scupper his plans?

episodes.name: Once Bitten, Twice Shy
episodes.overview: Vlad persuades Sally and George to stay a little while at Garside, as he would like to get to know them better. Despite his pleas for his vampire family to pretend to be normal, Ingrid can't help herself and chaos soon descends.

episodes.name: Warning Shadows
episodes.overview: A mysterious stranger visits Garside and warns the Draculas that they are they next target of Ramanga's fearsome Shadow Warriors.

episodes.name: The Enemy Within
episodes.overview: The Count is revelling in his victory over the Shadow Warriors when he gets even more good news. The Dracula family celebrations are cut short by another unexpected arrival.

episodes.name: Nemesis Rising
episodes.overview: Malik finds a surprising ally in his mission to rescue his mother from the Blood Mirror. Vlad is delighted when a friend he met travelling pays him a visit, but what will she make of his breather houseguests?

episodes.name: Open House
episodes.overview: The Count arranges an open house viewing to sell Garside, but thanks to Asan and Shango there are a few surprises in store for the Draculas and their potential breather buyers.

episodes.name: The Bodyguard
episodes.overview: When the VHC appoint a bodyguard to protect Vlad from the Bounty Hunters he's worried that his secret of being half-human will be discovered.

episodes.name: Blood Match
episodes.overview: The Draculas' bedtime routine descends into chaos when they are set upon by enemies old and new. Renfield will be sweeping up the dust of at least one fallen vampire before the night is through.

episodes.name: Bite Me
episodes.overview: With Vlad about to turn 18 and due to become the Chosen One, Ingrid decides to make a final bid for power. Her plan is almost faultless, if only she hadn't underestimated Renfield.

episodes.name: The Darkest Hour (1)
episodes.overview: It is Vlad's 18th birthday and he is anxious about becoming the Chosen One. Nothing can prepare him for a triple-pronged attack, as he faces up to the Ramangas, the Vampire High Council and the Magister Maleficorum.

episodes.name: The Darkest Hour (2)
episodes.overview: As the sun rises on his 18th birthday, will Vlad be granted his biggest wish and become human? With the Blood Seed flourishing and his family under attack, it's certainly not going to be an easy decision to make.
